name: Sorcerer
desc: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline
coolFeatures: Has a sorcerous origin from some magical force and can cast spells instinctually
Can customize the casting of spells by making them quieter or more powerful or target more creatures
Sorcerous Origins include: Divine Soul, Draconic Bloodline, Shadow Magic, Storm Sorcery, and Wild Magic
prompts: How do you feel about the magical power coursing through you? Do you embrace it, try to master it, or revel in its unpredictable nature?
Is it a blessing or a curse? Did you seek it out, or did it find you?
What do you intend to do with the power within you?
Where does your power come from? A deal your ancestors made with a powerful being like an Overlord or Daelkyr? Blood-relations with the mysterious and powerful dragons?
